analysis.description:
ExternalView.totalInfo (/unique_contracts/0xdc0de47538badee1e12c189e5c94cf19c2f27efa.sol#365-379) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (startTime > 0,block.timestamp >= endTime,addressOfCaptain,totalPot,endTime,sharesOfScheme(MAIN_SCHEME),valueOfScheme(MAIN_SCHEME),maxTime,addedTime,addressOfOwner) (/unique_contracts/0xdc0de47538badee1e12c189e5c94cf19c2f27efa.sol#371-379)

WinnerWinner.start (/unique_contracts/0xdc0de47538badee1e12c189e5c94cf19c2f27efa.sol#448-458) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(startTime == 0) (/unique_contracts/0xdc0de47538badee1e12c189e5c94cf19c2f27efa.sol#449)

WinnerWinner.buy (/unique_contracts/0xdc0de47538badee1e12c189e5c94cf19c2f27efa.sol#459-512) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- endTime.add(goldenTickets.mul(addedTime)) > block.timestamp.add(maxTime) (/unique_contracts/0xdc0de47538badee1e12c189e5c94cf19c2f27efa.sol#500-506)

WinnerWinner.withdrawPot (/unique_contracts/0xdc0de47538badee1e12c189e5c94cf19c2f27efa.sol) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(startTime > 0) (/unique_contracts/0xdc0de47538badee1e12c189e5c94cf19c2f27efa.sol)
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > (endTime + 600)) (/unique_contracts/0xdc0de47538badee1e12c189e5c94cf19c2f27efa.sol)
